attributes.action: Prioritise keyworkers being vaccinated against COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: We need to prioritise people who are most at risk of contracting and/or passing on the virus due to the nature of their work bringing them into contact with many different people during the course of their working day
attributes.background:
If a safe vaccine against COVID-19 is available, give our keyworkers the option of being vaccinated against it first . Keyworkers include health care professionals, people working in schools, public transport, care homes etc
Keyworkers are invaluable members of society and keep the country running
